attributes.action: Stop Greenbelt land at Fereneze Slopes being built on for housing development.
attributes.background: Gladman Development Ltd are looking to get planning permission passed to allow building of 50 homes on the designated Greenbelt site of Fereneze Slopes in Barrhead, East Renfrewshire. This petition is against the planning application being approved

rejection.details:
The decision to develop Fereneze Slopes appears to be one to be taken by your local council and not the UK Government. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are and how to contact them:
 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You may be able to start a petition to the Scottish Parliament about this. You can contact the clerks of the Public Petitions Committee for advice about this by emailing petitions@scottish.parliament.uk.
